about_the_game:
Get instant access to Level 200 with this bundle of Heckler Juice!

This pack includes:

  • Heckler Juice (Level 1 - 60)
  • Heckler Juice (Level 60 - 100)
  • Heckler Juice (Level 100 - 150)
  • Heckler Juice (Level 150 - 200)


Not available on the new Rubi-Ka 2019 Server.
You cannot have the "Disable XP Gain" option selected when using this item. Max level cap is 220.
To use this item, you must be within the same region as the ICC Headquarters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Pentium III 450MHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct3D-compatible 32MB video card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound device
